trans-unit.source: Authenticates a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security token using a custom authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: 驗證<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>使用自訂驗證配置的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Override the CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator class when the Windows authentication provided by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> class isn't sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的 Windows 驗證時，覆寫 CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator 類別<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>類別不敷使用。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> class authenticates the user name and password in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token as a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>類別進行驗證的使用者名稱和密碼在<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>做為 Windows 帳戶的安全性權杖。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: To provide a custom authentication scheme, derive a class from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> class, implement the authentication scheme, and then pass that class to the constructor for the CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator class.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供自訂驗證配置，請從<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>類別，實作驗證配置，則會傳遞該 CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator 類別的建構函式的類別</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>衍生類別

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class using the specified validator.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref>類別使用指定的驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> specified in the `validator` parameter is used by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A> method to authenticate the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>中所指定`validator`參數由用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A>方法來驗證使用者。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator"></xref> that authenticates the user name and password using a custom authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator"> </xref>來驗證的使用者名稱和密碼使用自訂驗證配置。

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified user name and password and returns the set of authorization policies for <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 驗證指定的使用者名稱和密碼，並傳回一組授權原則的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The ValidateUserNamePasswordCore method uses the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> passed into the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to authenticate the user.
trans-unit.target: ValidateUserNamePasswordCore 方法會使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>傳入<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式來驗證使用者。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>

trans-unit.source: When the username and password cannot be validated, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>.
trans-unit.target: 無法驗證使用者名稱和密碼，會擲回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>

trans-unit.source: When there are no authorization policies in effect for this application, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.
trans-unit.target: 此應用程式的作用中的任何授權原則時，傳回空<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>的型別<xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: When `null` is returned from the ValidateUserNamePasswordCore method, [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] throws the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>.
trans-unit.target: 當`null`ValidateUserNamePasswordCore 方法中，從傳回[!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>會擲回

trans-unit.source: The user name associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 使用者名稱安全性權杖相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The password associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 與安全性權杖相關聯的密碼。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>型別的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> ，其中包含作用中對此應用程式的授權原則集合。
